text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActProductAcquisitionCode

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActProductAcquisitionCodeActProductAcquisitionCodeThe method that a product is obtained for use by the subject of the supply act (e.g. patient). Product examples are consumable or durable goods.

name: ActProductAcquisitionCode
title: ActProductAcquisitionCode
description: The method that a product is obtained for use by the subject of the supply act (e.g. patient). Product examples are consumable or durable goods.
